comments.body: This broke backwards compatibility for me.  I think it should be lowercase `'api_token'`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +189,193 @@            state=dict(choices=['present', 'absent'], default='present'),
            oauth_token=dict(
                aliases=['API_TOKEN'],
                no_log=True,
                fallback=(env_fallback, ['DO_API_TOKEN', 'DO_API_KEY', 'DO_OAUTH_TOKEN'])
